alert.note: Alert for Somerset; Wicomico; Worcester (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 11:14AM EDT until June 14 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Somerset County in southeastern Maryland... Wicomico County in southeastern Maryland... Worcester County in southeastern Maryland... * Until noon EDT. * At 1113 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Salisbury, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Newark around 1145 AM EDT. Berlin around 1150 AM EDT. Ocean City and Cape Isle Of Wight around 1200 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bishop, Boxiron, Ocean City Municipality, Salisbury-Wicomico, Bishopville, Public Landing, Eden, Ironshire, Allen and Willards. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
